name: nodatime
description: Guidance for NodaTime date and time library for .NET. USE FOR: precise date/time handling, time zone conversions, period and duration calculations, calendar-aware date arithmetic, replacing ambiguous DateTime usage, scheduling across time zones. DO NOT USE FOR: simple timestamp logging (use DateTimeOffset), timer-based scheduling (use PeriodicTimer), date formatting only (use standard .NET formatting), legacy .NET Framework DateTime interop without conversion.
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
